member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Properties.Resources.Plugin
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"> <html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> <head> <meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" /> <meta name="Author" content="Fraser Chapman" /> <title>plugin code</title> <script type="text/javascript" src="http://www.google.com/jsapi?key="></script> <script type="text/javascript"> /* <![CDATA[ */
google.load("earth", "1"); google.load("maps", "2.xx [rest of string was truncated]";.
